descriptionHtml:
The Dragon Cult, a small group of skilled warriors and mages who worship the Dragonborn, has emerged. The player may now investigate.

Features:
A skeleton of a Dwemer castle
A throne with an OP NPC
Exterior near Winterhold

Unfinished Features:
Fully scripted quest
Fully functional home

Planned Features:
Buy upgrades
Dragon Cult followers
Custom armor/weapons
Perhaps a few spells

PM or comment if you are interested in texturing/modeling for this mod.
author: xv435
